# Problem Domain: 
### Understanding racial injustice in American Incarceration

In the last ten years Americans have begun to look critically at the justice system in our country. The clear pattern of racial injustice and continued systematic oppression of minorities, specifically African Americans, has been discussed in mainstream media.
